summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4615 for the improvement of the alley in block 19, Laurelhurst Heights Addition, as condemned by Ordinance No 46859, from 51st Avenue Northeast to a point 25 feet southwest of southwest line of Lot 15 of said block by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53678, as amended by Ordinance No. 53890, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
